{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Doru |image = male_godlike_moon_a_sm.png |image2 = PE2 Doru.png |caption = |race = Godlike |subrace = Moon |gender = Male |culture = [Deadfire Archipelago](/deadfireArchipelago/) |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = Professional, Religious |class = Cipher |level = 5 |MIG = 13 |CON = 13 |DEX = 13 |PER = 12 |INT = 12 |RES = 12 |location = [Port Maje](/portMaje/) harbor supplies |quests = |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Breastplate (Deadfire){{!}}Breastplate |weapon1 = Blunderbuss (Deadfire){{!}}Blunderbuss |internalname = CHA_00_Crew_BB_3
CRW_BB_3 |guid = 337cee90-d5cb-4422-89c4-320ab47ebbd9 }} '''Doru''' is a character and recruitable [crew member](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/) in {{poe2}}. ## Background Apart from being a moon godlike, which is unique in itself, Doru is also a master cannoneer, a master cook, and a native to the [Deadfire Archipelago](/deadfireArchipelago/). ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |none = |other = |crew = * {{crewrank|4|cannoneer}} * {{crewrank|4|cook}} * Personality: Professional, Religious * {{cp2|600}} to hire (only with the "Legendary Crew" [Berath's Blessing](/berathsBlessing/) enabled) }} [Category:Port Maje crew recruits](/categoryPortMajeCrewRecruits/) [Category:Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire crew members](/categoryPillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/)
